Sebion:
M-m-m ... I think I can tell you about it. An underground tunnel connected to the Labyrinth Bellis, was the abode of Harnack, King of the Giants. Another discovery, agitated our minds! Yes, this is a very important find.
However, most scouts who have studied the tunnel were killed incomprehensible creatures. And many of those who managed to come back, died in terrible agony. So we turned to the study.
